channel.title: CVE Feed for Saturday Drive -- Ninja Forms
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Saturday Drive -- Ninja Forms

item.title: CVE-2024-29220|2024-07-31T17:42:46.503Z -- saturday%20drive -- ninja%20forms
item.description: Ninja Forms prior to 3.8.1 contains a cross-site scripting vulnerability in custom fields for labels. If this vulnerability is exploited, an arbitrary script may be executed on the web browser of the user who is accessing to the website using the product.

item.title: CVE-2024-37934|2024-07-09T13:20:31.335Z -- saturday%20drive -- ninja%20forms
item.description: Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection') vulnerability in Saturday Drive Ninja Forms allows Code Injection.This issue affects Ninja Forms: from n/a through 3.8.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-25572|2024-06-26T15:58:07.894Z -- saturday%20drive -- ninja%20forms
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability exists in Ninja Forms prior to 3.4.31. If a website administrator views a malicious page while logging in, unintended operations may be performed.

item.title: CVE-2023-38393|2024-06-20T13:28:42.386Z -- saturday%20drive -- ninja%20forms
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Saturday Drive Ninja Forms.This issue affects Ninja Forms: from n/a through 3.6.25.

item.title: CVE-2023-38386|2024-06-19T13:06:42.439Z -- saturday%20drive -- ninja%20forms
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Saturday Drive Ninja Forms.This issue affects Ninja Forms: from n/a through 3.6.25.

item.title: CVE-2024-25572|2024-04-11T02:29:38.560Z -- saturday%20drive -- ninja%20forms
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability exists in Ninja Forms prior to 3.4.31. If a website administrator views a malicious page while logging in, unintended operations may be performed.

item.title: CVE-2024-26019|2024-04-11T02:29:26.514Z -- saturday%20drive -- ninja%20forms
item.description: Ninja Forms prior to 3.8.1 contains a cross-site scripting vulnerability in submit processing. If this vulnerability is exploited, an arbitrary script may be executed on the web browser of the user who is accessing to the website using the product.

item.description: Ninja Forms prior to 3.8.1 contains a cross-site scripting vulnerability in custom fields for labels. If this vulnerability is exploited, an arbitrary script may be executed on the web browser of the user who is accessing to the website using the product.
